fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give Unstoppable defense to anyone who completed roletober.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Everyone who completes roletober wins the game instantly when this is rolled.
- If you roll this, you get a free reroll. The first attribute still takes affect.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see roletober beaters win.
